  CL: 23

```{r setup, echo=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

## Add your scores here

```{r, echo=FALSE}
scores <- 
  tibble::tribble(
~Name,     ~AL, ~CL,
"Freels",   20,  34,
"Chon",     00,  00,
"Walton",   00,  00,
"Watson",   00,  00
)
```

```{r, echo=FALSE}
scores$diff <- abs(scores$AL - params$AL) + abs(scores$CL - params$CL)

scores$rank <- rank(scores$diff)
scores[order(scores$rank),]
```
